mapper.select: SELECT user_id userId, user_name userName, company_name companyName, date_format(regdate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') regdate, date_format(updtdate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') updtdate FROM nexclipper_user
